paper_abstract: We show that it is undecidable whether or not a given N-rational series assumes all nonnegative values. As a consequence we see that it is undecidable whether the image of a given N-rational series equals the image of a given N-rational sequence. We discuss also related results concerning DT0L and D0L length sets.
paper_title: On the problem whether the image of an N-rational series equals N
